title: Complaint
subtitle: Below you can find out how to cotact us if you have a complaint.

section1.title: Baggage Claim
section1.description: Do you wish to report your damaged or lost baggage? Please fill out the Baggage Form from our partner Nordica

section2.title: Flight & Flight Booking
section2.text1: Do you have a complaint about your booking or flight? We're sorry to hear this.
section2.text2: Please use our contact form below to send us your complaints or tell us more about the problem.
